Title: Relates to the operation of agricultural plated trucks on state highways
Summary: Provides criteria for the exemption of agricultural plated trucks from rules and regulations excluding the operation of certain vehicles on state highways.
LawCode: Amd ยง1621, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to exceptions from prohibitions on the operation of agricultural plated trucks on certain state highways and parkways
